name: Noowit
tagline: Wordpress plugin for posting directly from your blog to your NooWit Magazine
body:
# About

This is an independent developed Wordpress plugin for posting directly from your blog directly to your Noowit Magazine. The plugin isn't available in the default Wordpress repository, so you have to manually install it. For more information on manually installing plugins you can refer to [Wordpress Documentation](http://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins) .

**This plugin depends highly on curl php library**, so you have to make sure that it is installed in your server for it to function properly.

# Configuration
After installation you can find Noowit configuration options under Settings Menu in Administrator interface. 

![Settings](http://i.imgur.com/irZa3a0.png)

There, you have to specify you authentication key which you can obtain from "My MAG Settings" section under Settings in Noowit Web Application. The key is needed in order to establish correct communication to Noowit server and authenticate against it so that your posts are properly published under your Noowit Magazine. 

![Obtaining Authentication Key](http://i.imgur.com/0oUpsSa.jpg)

# Use
There are two publishing options available. 

![Publishing Options](http://i.imgur.com/U0ffr6k.png)

Automatically publishing a post to your Noowit Magazine whenever you hit the Publish button, or manually publishing your post. In the latter case, an extra Noowit Publish button appears above the Publish button to support this functionality.

![Publish to Noowit](http://i.imgur.com/y72jjp6.png)

When publishing a post to Noowit, either via the "Publish to Noowit" button or by automatically publishing it, the Title, Subject, Category and Featured Image of fields of the post are being submitted. So you have to specify all these fields in order your post to appear to your Noowit Magazine.
